mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_no, notice_category, notice_title, notice_content, notice_fname) values(seq_notice_no.nextval, #{notice_category},#{notice_title},#{notice_content},#{notice_fname})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_hit=notice_hit+1 where notice_no=#{notice_no}
update notice set notice_category=#{notice_category}, notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content}, notice_fname=#{notice_fname} where notice_no=#{notice_no}
